data.name: Yolo Space Hacker - Mission Forensic
data.detailed_description:
Do you have a technical background (unix shell, IP address...)?
You want to discover Forensic: the art of collecting information on computer equipment?

Well, C4ptA1n entrusts you with the pentest of RedPill's warehouses.
Be ready to rummage in bins, analyse files, usb drives, network captures...
And we'll take the opportunity to exploit some security holes...

Sharpen your tools!

And if possible, come with a friend, the mission can be played in Co-op.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
